file_content.text: The Republic stands on the brink of annihilation. We must all make sacrifices to save our people.
I will aid you with all the strength I possess.
So many great Jedi have fallen. It fills my heart with sorrow.
We must save as many lives as we can. That is as important as defeating our enemy.
Those assassins had me at a disadvantage. Thank you, old friends.
Master Kiwiiks, you look exhausted. Are you hurt?
Just getting old, Kira. Happens to the best of us.
Thank you, my friend. Those assassins were highly persistent.
Before they attacked, the Sith showed me a holo of Master Braga. He ordered them to kill me.
Master Braga is a puppet. The Emperor was trying to demoralize you.
The Emperor controls him.
Seeing our most peace-loving Master speaking with such hatred was horrifying.
How did he sound? Was there any trace of his true self?
Did you speak to him?
It seemed like him, but that cold-blooded killer couldn't be my old friend.
The Emperor plans to kill everyone on Corellia, and with Master Braga's help.
I have to find him.
My old friend would never do that. The Emperor's domination of Master Braga must be responsible.
Master Satele appointed me supreme commander of Jedi forces here. You should meet our reinforcements at these coordinates.
I fear I'm not much of a soldier. I've never truly recovered from what happened on Tatooine.
I've barely managed to survive so far. Perhaps my talents are better applied elsewhere....
Don't worry. My friend here would never send an old lady into a war zone. Right?
We can do this without her.
This battle will not be won without sacrifices.
Not every soldier belongs on a battlefield, but we need everyone we can get.
Battlefield = no place for old Jedi
I could focus on evacuating the wounded to the medical transports.
Saving lives is just as important as stopping the enemy. Go and save all the wounded you can.
Yes, help the wounded.
I need every Jedi to stop the Emperor's plan, but do what you feel is right.
The final decision is yours.
I have faith you will defeat the Emperor without me.
When you find Master Braga, please bring him home alive. May the Force be with you.
We're facing the total destruction of Corellia. Only the combined forces of every Jedi on this world can stop that.
No, you must fight.
I'll serve you to the best of my abilities. May the Force be with us.
I'll see you at the rendezvous.
Once again, the Jedi are faced with extinction. We must not fail.
Press ahead. Do not give up.
Hold on, Master. We'll get you help. We need you.
I'm sorry, Kira.
Save Tol Braga. Save us all....
Master? Master....
It's over. You have to let her go.
She's gone, Kira.
She wasn't strong enough for this. I should've let her evacuate the wounded, like she wanted.
It's all my fault.
The only people I blame are these scum. I'm glad they're dead.
Get a hold of yourself. We still have a job to do.
Don't waste your tears.
When your time comes, I promise not to cry.
Let's get through that door and finish this.
She's gone. We need to finish this.
May the Force protect us!
Everyone stay close! Fight as one!
Watch behind you! Enemies are everywhere!
Keep each other in sight at all times!
